title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
OB: When I inspect the report design, I can see that the library include is storing an absolute path instead of a relative path. For example, <property name="fileName">E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property>.
EB: The expected behavior is that when a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path instead. For example, if my report design is located in $project/test, the relative path should be saved as lib1.rptlibrary.
